summary: The Bee Gees were a famous music group made up of brothers Barry, Robin, and Maurice Gibb. They started in 1958 and became very popular in the 1960s and 1970s, especially with disco music. Known for their unique three-part harmonies, they wrote their own songs and even helped other artists achieve success. The Bee Gees sold over 120 million records and won many awards, making them one of the biggest-selling music groups ever. After Maurice's death in 2003, Barry and Robin took a break but later decided to perform together again. Unfortunately, Robin passed away in 2012.
title: Bee Gees
